properties.title: Claridenhütte SAC
properties.description: Modern cabin with rooms in various sizes, some of them small, located in the remotest corner of Glarnerland. Formerly close to Claridenfirn, today on the fascinating glacier foreland with its many pioneer plants. With its separate schooling-room the cabin is convenient for hosting training courses. The climbing park «Tödiblick» with limestone rock on the south side of Beggilücke is easily accessible. Suitable for mountain hiking from cabin to cabin. In winter and spring the cabin is in the center of a multifaceted ski mountaineering area.
properties.city: Central Switzerland, Glarus – St. Gallen – Appenzell
properties.place: Central Switzerland, Glarus – St. Gallen – Appenzell
